extendedInfo.description: Over 50 different types of units and buildings! Train knights, archers, axemen, catapults, swordsmen to attack your enemy. Build castles, barracks, farms and towers. Improve their range, damage and strength. Gain access to new units in each map. Extract gold from gold mines.Just like in RPG games your soldiers and towers gain experience and become stronger and harder to kill after every fight they surviveBuild your city. Defend attacks. Destroy the enemy!Medieval Empires  will remind you right away of the classic RTS games like Warcraft, Starcraft, Command & Conquer or Age of Empires.Medieval real time strategy, epic battles with tens of enemies, special units and powerful magic towers. Real time strategy for tablets and smartphones with big screens. A new breed of RTS strategy games for mobile entertainment that raises the quality bar to unbelievable heights. This game is designed, crafted and published with you in mind!Searching for a strategy game that ticks all the boxes and more? Disappointed with RoboDefense and GraveDefense? Try this. Every map can be conquered using new and varied strategies.It is absolutely the best real-time strategy for Android.Cut enemies like worms. Be the duke of the middle age empire. Jump into the world of extermination constructions full of advantures. Make your enemies angry by dragging annihilation on their villages. Get the Glory by conquering new worlds. Be the master of destruction!Are you ready for the challenge...?If you like war games or economy games, you like order in your army, want to bring chaos to your enemies... be the defender of the middle age city, create a playground over your oponents buildings... be the knight of minecrafting... if you are bored of all the virtual zombie games, you have to try new taste in arcade and action world. Try Medieval Empires!

reviews.title: Addicting but would like to see..
reviews.comment: I would like to see that you could do custom games instead of just facing 1 other person, like facing 5 people at the same the and battle for power in a map, But all in all this is a great/addicting/fun/ game recommended to everyone,I just hope they can put custom games in the game,it would make it a lot better.
reviews.author: Austin Hinz

reviews.title: Excellent RTS for a tablet
reviews.comment: The only problem I am currently having is that it freezes up every now and then. Other than that I think this app is awesome, simple enough for a mobile device, but holding true to the strategy side. The difficulties hold true to their titles, and give fair competition to you, whether beginner or hardcore RTS gamer. Custom games would be a nice feature, too.
reviews.author: Blake Bryant

reviews.title: Fun but a lot of problems
reviews.comment: Its a good time killer,but units lag,units and buildings sometime invisible, in really easy mode I\'m already getting attacked when I begin the game.
reviews.author: Saul Morones

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Game play was okay, felt far too limited. The first age of empires had far more tools and customablity options and that was out over a decade ago make a paid version with more resources.

reviews.title: How-To-Guide?
reviews.comment: I must have really missed something. I don\'t know how to even control my guys and maybe that\'s bc I don\'t have a lot of xp playing games on my cell. In this game, it seems there are tons of bad to my one good.  I thought since I knew how to play Age of Empires, this would be easy to do and fun but even AoE explained how to play. If someone could point me in the right direction, that would be great.
reviews.author: Jessica Notkin

reviews.title: Why don\'t you just turn on airplane mode -_-\"
reviews.comment: Guys.... Really. The game works great if you turn on airplane mode (or just turn off WiFi). It\'s as simple as that :D PS. But yeah, the ads are an knowing :|
